title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Nativity, Study after Carlo  Cignani", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at lower left: 8, Carlo Cignani Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Seated Virgin with Child at center left; Joseph leaning on staff at right. Ox and donkey at left in background. Kneeling shepherd and trussed sheep at lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Nativity, Study after Carlo  Cignani", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3555.
